pkgmetadata.longdescription: The LIC for T Distribution Regression Analysis // This comprehensive toolkit for T-distributed regression is designated as "TLIC" (The LIC for T Distribution Regression Analysis) analysis. It is predicated on the assumption that the error term adheres to a T-distribution. The philosophy of the package is described in Guo G. (2020) doi:10.1080/02664763.2022.2053949.
